O give thanks unto the LORD; for <FI>he is<Fi> good: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him that made great lights: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
The sun to rule by day: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:<RF>to ruleâ€¦: Heb. for the rulings by day<Rf>
The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.<CM>
To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.<RF>overthrew: Heb. shaked off<Rf>
To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
To him which smote great kings: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And slew famous kings: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
<FI>Even<Fi> an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.<CM>
Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever:
And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.<CM>
